ooC: Kyle, just because I'm not replying, doesn't mean Owlhawk can 
keep attacking. Megatron's toast right now (or will be soon), so 
Owlhawk couldn't/shouldn't have been attacking him. =p

--Megatron/Switchblade--

Megatron's auditory cicuitry managed to to emit a short sound, "Noo--
-". The shearing white blade of immesurable energy slammed into his 
large dragonlike robot form. His armour was quickly destroying his 
armour, and bits of his inner circuitry. The bot was thrown 
backwards a good 50 feet and the final fall tore his torso in two. 
All that could be seen of Megatron was a charred, severly damaged 
heap of slag, consisiting only of Megatron's general form. Lucky for 
the Predacon leader, the weapon didn't stay focused on Megatron 
long, and it hit him above his spark, so the spark still survived.

Switchblade loses control of the artifact, and his circuits overload 
with the intense release of energy. The artifact shatters into 
pieces, one dropping to his feet, and the other three disappearing 
in what looks like a sort of translocation like release of energy. 
They quite frankly were there one instant, and gone the next.

Switchblade crumples up into a heap as the artifact pieces finish 
their massive display. He hits the ground before the single 
remaining pieces does. The apparently fragile piece proves to be 
more durable than thought as it hits the ground, and stops moving 
with a clattering sound. Switchblade's sensors start recovering from 
the overload, and his green eyes flicker several times before 
returning to their usual erie dark greenish glow.

His systems stablizing, he speaks slowly, "...uhh...whoa..." and 
starts testing out the funcionality in his legs and arms. Seeing 
that they were fine, he gets to his feet, almost still in a daze. He 
looks down and spots the single piece of the artifact. "Hmm, I 
thought that I found 4 of them..." He stoops down to pick up the 
remaining piece, then notices the larged slag like slashed hole in 
the side of the storage room. He looks back at the piece of the 
artifact, and then back at the hold again. Shaking his head, he 
walks over to the hole, and peeks through, and sees a path of 
destruction cut through some trees, and such. He doesn't see 
Megatron, so he leaves the hole, and heads for the ship's exit.
